p: The distribution of the 12 marker compounds in the PC loading plot showed PC scores relevant to the medicinal parts in which they were contained: skimmin, chlorogenic acid, rutin, isoquercitrin, astragalin, and quercitrin had positive PC1 and negative PC2 scores; mulberroside A, kuwanon G and morusin had negative PC1 and PC2 scores, and 4-hydroxycinnamic acid, oxyresveratrol and taxifolin had negative PC1 and positive PC2 scores ( Figure 5).
